sentences.sContent: The trip was made all the worse by Frankie’s morbid fear of flying.
sentences.sCn: 弗朗基对坐飞机有种病态的恐惧，使得旅途变得更加糟糕。

sentences.sContent: His head was full of morbid thoughts.
sentences.sCn: 他的脑袋里全是不健康的思想。

synos.tran: 病态的；由病引起的；恐怖的；病变部位的

remMethod.val: morb (看作mort， 死) + id → 病得快死了 → 病态的

trans.tranCn: 病态的；由病引起的；恐怖的；病变部位的
trans.tranOther: with a strong and unhealthy interest in unpleasant subjects, especially death
